scene_title.description: The scene this video prompt is for

motion_summary.description: Brief description of the primary motion/movement in this video

positive_prompt.description: Main motion prompt describing what should happen - primary motion, secondary motion, camera, atmosphere

negative_prompt.description: REQUIRED: Comprehensive list of artifacts and unwanted elements to avoid - morphing, deformation, extra limbs, flickering, etc.

motion_notes.description: Brief notes on what motion elements are emphasized

prompt_a.description: Start state - describes the opening frame/moment

prompt_b.description: End state - describes where the motion leads to

negative_prompt.description: REQUIRED: Elements to avoid throughout the animation - morphing, artifacts, anatomical errors

transition_notes.description: Brief description of how A transitions to B
